com.ibasco.agql.core

Interface ChannelRegistry


  • public interface ChannelRegistry
    A registry/store for all managed netty based Channel. Implementation of this class must be thread-safe
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(io.netty.channel.Channel channel)
       throws ChannelRegistrationException
        Register a newly acquired Channel. This method is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        channel - The Channel to be registered
        Throws:
        ChannelRegistrationException - If the registration fails

      • unregister

        boolean unregister(io.netty.channel.Channel channel)
        Unregister a Channel. This method is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        channel - The Channel to be unregistered
        Returns:
        true if the Channel was successfuly unregistred.

      • isRegistered

        boolean isRegistered(io.netty.channel.Channel channel)
        Check if Channel is registered by this instance.
        Parameters:
        channel - The Channel to check.
        Returns:
        true if the Channel is registered by this instance.

      • getEntries

        Set<Map.Entry<InetSocketAddress,io.netty.channel.Channel>> getEntries()

        getEntries.

        Returns:
        a Set object

      • getAddresses

        Set<InetSocketAddress> getAddresses()

        A unique set of registered InetSocketAddress

        Returns:
        a Set object

      • getChannels

        Set<io.netty.channel.Channel> getChannels(InetSocketAddress address)

        The Channel's acquired for the specified InetSocketAddress

        Parameters:
        address - The InetSocketAddress to be used for the lookup
        Returns:
        a Set of Channel instances acquired for the address

      • getCount

        int getCount(InetSocketAddress address)
        The number of Channel registered for the specified InetSocketAddress
        Parameters:
        address - The InetSocketAddress to lookup
        Returns:
        The total number of registered Channel for the specified address
